header.v: Giá trị phải nhỏ hơn cột giờ kết thúc.
header.e: Invalid value in column must be less than column end time.

processing.text: if @@admin = 0 and @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, 'SFCWorkingShift', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end declare @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(4000), @irregular nvarchar(4000), @message nvarchar(4000), @$message nvarchar(4000), @irregularChars varchar(128), @field varchar(32), @r int, @d datetime select @irregularChars = &IrregularValue;, @d = getDate() select @irregular = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell có chứa các ký tự: ' + @irregularChars else 'The value of cell %invalidCell contains any of the following characters: ' + @irregularChars end select @duplicate = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell đã có hoặc lồng nhau.' else 'The value of cell %invalidCell is invalid or already exists.' end select @message = case when @@language = 'V' then N'Giá trị tại cột Giờ bắt đầu phải nhỏ hơn cột Giờ kết thúc, dòng %r.' else N'Invalid value in column Start Time must be less than column End Time, row %r.' end create index i on @@table (ma_ca) -- Delete if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a join sfdmca b on a.ma_ca = b.ma_ca update @@table set gio_bd = '0' + gio_bd where len(gio_bd) < 5 update @@table set gio_kt = '0' + gio_kt where len(gio_kt) < 5 -- Checking &Checking; if @$mode = 1 begin set @$message = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Giá trị có chứa các ký tự: ' else N'The value contains any of the following characters: ' end + @irregularChars &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_ca', stt, @$message from @@table where ma_ca like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%' &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ma_ca', @r = min(stt) from @@table where ma_ca like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%'&Irregular; end if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'gio_bd', stt, 'C001' from @@table where convert(datetime, gio_bd, 114) >= convert(datetime, gio_kt, 114) &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'gio_bd', @r = min(stt) from @@table where convert(datetime, gio_bd, 114) >= convert(datetime, gio_kt, 114)&TimeInOutError; end -- Gather select a.* into #k from @@table a join sfdmca b on a.ma_ca = b.ma_ca delete @@table from @@table a join #k b on a.ma_ca = b.ma_ca -- Checking select @field = 'ma_ca' if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, ''00003'' from @@table a, @@table b with (index(i)) where a.ma_ca <> b.ma_ca and a.ma_ca like rtrim(b.ma_ca) + ''%'' &w1;@field&w2;a.stt&w3;''00003''&w4; group by a.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, ''00003'' from @@table a with (index(i)), sfdmca b with (index(PK_sfdmca)) where a.ma_ca like rtrim(b.ma_ca) + ''%'' &w1;@field&w2;a.stt&w3;''00003''&w4; group by a.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, b.stt, ''00003'' from sfdmca a with (index(PK_sfdmca)), @@table b with (index(i)) where a.ma_ca like rtrim(b.ma_ca) + ''%'' &w1;@field&w2;b.stt&w3;''00003''&w4; group by b.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @q = 'select top 1 @r = a.stt from @@table a, @@table b with (index(i)) where a.ma_ca <> b.ma_ca and a.ma_ca like rtrim(b.ma_ca) + ''%''' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; select top 1 @r = a.stt from @@table a, sfdmca b with (index(PK_sfdmca)) where a.ma_ca like rtrim(b.ma_ca) + '%'&Duplicate; select @q = 'select top 1 @r = b.stt from sfdmca a, @@table b with (index(i)) where a.ma_ca like rtrim(b.ma_ca) + ''%''' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; end &EndErrorMode; -- Insert &Inserting; -- Update if @type = '1' begin &Updating; end
